definition: the work of providing treatment for or attending to someone or something, to improve the condition of
details:
noun
- the work of providing treatment for or attending to someone or something
= synonyms: care
- the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
= synonyms: assist
- a resource
= example: a resource
= synonyms: assistance, help
- money to support a worthy person or cause
= synonyms: economic aid, financial aid
verb
- to improve the condition of
= example: to improve the condition of
= synonyms: help
- to give help or assistance
= example: to give help or assistance
= synonyms: assist
